resources.string: Please connect to an available robot:

This App will enable the user to control a Robot through WiFi-Direct. Furthermore the user will be able to recieve a camera stream on the Android device while controlling the robot. Finally the the user will be able to set specific settings on the Robot through the App. 
 
 Using the Drawer Menu by swiping in from the right side of the phone or psuhing the menu button, the user will be shown the choices to enter: 

 1) Information 
 In this menu the user will be shown information regarding the Robot such as - Firmware version, Camera Storage, Battery, etc.

 2) Settings 
 In this menu the user will be able to change specific settings on the robot and in the App. Settings could be changing - The Robot name, Video Quality, Driving modes, etc. 

 3) Help 
 You are currently reading this menu, which intents to inform you about the functionality of the App.

 4) Disconnect 
 This Button ensures that the Android device and the Robot will be disconnected and the Android device WiFi-Direct module will be closed. The App will return to the Welcome/Connection menu to allow the user to connect to the same or a new Robot.


If unexpected and undocumented troubles are experienced through useing the App and the Robot please Contact the support to inform of the problems and hopefully we can help you.
